text: Les Rues-des-Vignes is a commune in Nord in north France. In 2019, 771 people lived there. == History == In the Middle Ages, it was called Vinchy. It was the site of a famous battle of the then-rising Charles Martel in spring 717. == References == == Other websites == * INSEE commune file Category:Communes in Nord
title: Les Rues-des-Vignes
